distance.description: The distance fog settings for different camera locations.

fog_start.description: The distance from the player that the fog will begin to appear. 'fog_start' must be less than or equal to 'fog_end'.

fog_end.description: The distance from the player that the fog will become fully opaque. 'fog_end' must be greater than or equal to 'fog_start'.

fog_color.description: The color that the fog will take on.

render_distance_types.description: Determines how distance value is used. Fixed distance is measured in blocks. Dynamic distance is multiplied by the current render distance.

volumetric.description: The volumetric fog settings. RTX is required for volumetric fogs.

media_coefficients.description: The coefficient settings for the volumetric fog in different blocks.

scattering.description: Proportion of light that is scattered per block.

absorption.description: Proportion of light that is absorbed (lost) per block.

density.description: The density settings for different camera locations.

max_density.description: The maximum amount of opaqueness that the ground fog will take on. A value from [0.0, 1.0].

max_density_height.description: The height in blocks that the ground fog will become it's maximum density.

zero_density_height.description: The height in blocks that the ground fog will be completely transparent and begin to appear. This value needs to be at least 1 higher than 'max_density_height'.

uniform.description: When set to true, the density will be uniform across all heights.
